ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Astronomical Anomalies?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm... Aren t those Signs of the Apocalypse? Maybe they are there to warn us of some impending doom. (server crash/intentional wipe, plague of bugs, etc.)
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm... Aren't those Signs of the Apocalypse? Maybe they are there to warn
us of some impending doom. (server crash/intentional wipe, plague of bugs,
etc.)

Clerics! We need your guidance!
(oh, no clerics on this board.. hehe!)

Aranlas Starchaser
Retired Bard of Tunare
----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 14, 2000 12:02 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New Astronomical Anomalies?


Just out of curiosity - how many people have noticed "extra" moons, new
planets, etc., hovering in the sky?

Talies




Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
